# javscraper
Scraper library for JAVs.

## Supported Sites
- R18
- JAVLibrary
- MGStage
- S1S1S1

## Requirements
- python3.4+
- geckodriver

## Installation
Install geckodriver or your custom driver of choice from
your package manager or add it to your PATH then install
the library.
```commandline
python -m pip install -U javscraper
```
